definitions.definition: The state or degree of being divergent : of diverging .
examples: An angle is made by the divergence of straight lines.

definitions.definition: The operator which maps a function F =( F 1 , ... F n ) from a n -dimensional vector space to itself to the function ∑ i = 1 n ∂ F i ∂ x i {\displaystyle \sum _{i=1}^{n}{\frac {\partial F_{i}}{\partial x_{i}}}} .
The process in which two or more populations accumulate genetic changes (mutations) through time.

main_definition: The state or degree of being divergent : of diverging .

The process in which two or more populations accumulate genetic changes (mutations) through time.
